constantValues: An activity performed by a user that has observational value to the business.

members.name: activityName

constantValues: Specific fields that includes data on customer's activity.

members.description: Specific fields that includes data on customer's activity.

members.name: attachmentReferences

constantValues: References to any attachment(s) for an activity.

members.description: References to any attachment(s) for an activity.

members.name: numberOfResponses

constantValues: Number of responses for/on an activity, like, number of emails on a thread, number of likes on a LinkedIn, Facebook post etc.

members.description: Number of responses for/on an activity, like, number of emails on a thread, number of likes on a LinkedIn, Facebook post etc.

members.name: version

constantValues: Denotes latest version of an activity for manual tracking.

members.description: Denotes latest version of an activity for manual tracking.
